name: Jumping Land
description:
Hold on. Little more, Good! Now!
Catch the moment and Jump! You have to jump as far as you can

Can you get what you want in a mysterious blue box?
Use a stick to avoid dangerous moments.
How about fly farther with riding Balloon?

You don’t have to be discouraged for getting nothing
Everything is available on Kitty's all-store

Timing jump action, Jumping Land! Why don’t you challenge? One, Two, right now!
